title: Possibly by ? W O Newton
content:
Can anyone ID this type or a similar digital font?   
 ![type sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526122025im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35489.jpg)
author: slistress

comments.content:
Just to clarify...   
Newton would have been the maker, probably around 1915

Sorry, I don't have an exact match. But if the stemless "n" and angled crossbar of the "e" are your main concerns, then FF Dax Condensed Bold might work. Clearface Gothic is a much older face that also has a similar feel.
